docs.text: LaxarJS UIKit is a collection of controls and base styles for LaxarJS widgets.
docs.title: README

docs.text:
Changelog


Last Changes


v0.9.6




#12
: Moved colors form default.theme to laxar_uikit


#11
: Fixed bootstrap limit of form-inline rules for view-ports.


#9
: Update Bower from ~1.2.8 to ~1.3.3.


#8
: The axInput control now respects the scope locale for on-focus formatting.




v0.9.5




#7
: Fixed grid depends on position of class col-lg in attribute.


#6
: Now the margin-top for a button variant (sm, xs) will calculate depending on bootstrap variables.




v0.9.4




#5
: Removed console.log statements from text-ellipsis control.




v0.9.3




#4
: Fixed table style with form elements.


#3
: Fixed spelling in grid classes.


#2
: Increased precision for calculation in sass.


#1
: Fixed compass environment for execution from bower components.
docs.title: Changelog
